      • enterText

        public boolean enterText(java.lang.String text,
                com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector uiSelector)
                  throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Sets the text in an editable field, after clearing the field's content. The UiSelector selector of this object must reference a UI element that is editable. When you call this method, the method first simulates a click() on editable field to set focus. The method then clears the field's contents and injects your specified text into the field. If you want to capture the original contents of the field, call getText() first. You can then modify the text and use this method to update the field.
        指定者:
        enterText 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        text - the text to be set.
        uiSelector - the target uiselector
        返回:
        true if operation is successful
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • drag

        public boolean drag(int startX,
           int startY,
           int endX,
           int endY,
           int steps)
        Performs a swipe from one coordinate to another coordinate. You can control the smoothness and speed of the swipe by specifying the number of steps. Each step execution is throttled to 5 milliseconds per step, so for a 100 steps, the swipe will take around 0.5 seconds to complete.
        指定者:
        drag 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        startX - X-axis value for the starting coordinate
        startY - Y-axis value for the starting coordinate
        endX - X-axis value for the ending coordinate
        endY - Y-axis value for the ending coordinate
        steps - is the number of steps for the swipe action
        返回:
        true if swipe is performed, false if the operation fails or the coordinates are invalid

      • dragTo

        public boolean dragTo(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector from,
             com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector to,
             int steps)
               throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Drags this object to a destination UiObject. The number of steps specified in your input parameter can influence the drag speed, and varying speeds may impact the results. Consider evaluating different speeds when using this method in your tests.
        指定者:
        dragTo 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        from - the ui selector to be dragged.
        to - the ui selector to be dragged to.
        steps - usually 40 steps. You can increase or decrease the steps to change the speed.
        返回:
        true if successful
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • swipe

        public boolean swipe(int startX,
            int startY,
            int endX,
            int endY,
            int steps)
        Performs a swipe from one coordinate to another using the number of steps to determine smoothness and speed. Each step execution is throttled to 5ms per step. So for a 100 steps, the swipe will take about 1/2 second to complete.
        指定者:
        swipe 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        startX - X-axis value for the starting coordinate
        startY - Y-axis value for the starting coordinate
        endX - X-axis value for the ending coordinate
        endY - Y-axis value for the ending coordinate
        steps - is the number of move steps sent to the system
        返回:
        false if the operation fails or the coordinates are invalid

      • swipe

        public boolean swipe(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector uiSelector,
            java.lang.String dir,
            int steps)
              throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Performs the swipe up/down/left/right action on the UiObject
        指定者:
        swipe 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        uiSelector - the target ui selector.
        dir - "u"/"up", "d"/"down", "l"/"left", "r"/"right"
        steps - indicates the number of injected move steps into the system. Steps are injected about 5ms apart. So a 100 steps may take about 1/2 second to complete.
        返回:
        true of successful
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • dumpWindow

        public java.lang.String dumpWindow(java.lang.String fileName,
                          boolean compressed)
        Helper method used for debugging to dump the current window's layout hierarchy. The file root location is /data/local/tmp
        指定者:
        dumpWindow 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        fileName - the filename to be stored.
        compressed - use compressed layout hierarchy or not using setCompressedLayoutHeirarchy method. Ignore the parameter in case the API level lt 18.
        返回:
        the absolute path name of dumped file.

      • screenshot

        public java.lang.String screenshot(java.lang.String fileName,
                          float scale,
                          int quality)
        Take a screenshot of current window and store it as PNG The screenshot is adjusted per screen rotation
        指定者:
        screenshot 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        fileName - where the PNG should be written to
        scale - scale the screenshot down if needed; 1.0f for original size
        quality - quality of the PNG compression; range: 0-100
        返回:
        the file name of the screenshot. null if failed.

      • wakeUp

        public void wakeUp()
            throws android.os.RemoteException
        This method simulates pressing the power button if the screen is OFF else it does nothing if the screen is already ON. If the screen was OFF and it just got turned ON, this method will insert a 500ms delay to allow the device time to wake up and accept input.
        指定者:
        wakeUp 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • waitForWindowUpdate

        public boolean waitForWindowUpdate(java.lang.String packageName,
                          long timeout)
        Waits for a window content update event to occur. If a package name for the window is specified, but the current window does not have the same package name, the function returns immediately.
        指定者:
        waitForWindowUpdate 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        packageName - the specified window package name (can be null). If null, a window update from any front-end window will end the wait.
        timeout - the timeout for the wait
        返回:
        true if a window update occurred, false if timeout has elapsed or if the current window does not have the specified package name

      • waitForExists

        public boolean waitForExists(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector uiSelector,
                    long timeout)
        Waits a specified length of time for a view to become visible. This method waits until the view becomes visible on the display, or until the timeout has elapsed. You can use this method in situations where the content that you want to select is not immediately displayed.
        指定者:
        waitForExists 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        uiSelector - the target ui selector
        timeout - time to wait (in milliseconds)
        返回:
        true if the view is displayed, else false if timeout elapsed while waiting

      • waitUntilGone

        public boolean waitUntilGone(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector obj,
                    long timeout)
        Waits a specified length of time for a view to become undetectable. This method waits until a view is no longer matchable, or until the timeout has elapsed. A view becomes undetectable when the UiSelector of the object is unable to find a match because the element has either changed its state or is no longer displayed. You can use this method when attempting to wait for some long operation to compete, such as downloading a large file or connecting to a remote server.
        指定者:
        waitUntilGone 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        obj - the target ui selector
        timeout - time to wait (in milliseconds)
        返回:
        true if the element is gone before timeout elapsed, else false if timeout elapsed but a matching element is still found.

      • flingBackward

        public boolean flingBackward(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector obj,
                    boolean isVertical)
                      throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Performs a backwards fling action with the default number of fling steps (5). If the swipe direction is set to vertical, then the swipe will be performed from top to bottom. If the swipe direction is set to horizontal, then the swipes will be performed from left to right. Make sure to take into account devices configured with right-to-left languages like Arabic and Hebrew.
        指定者:
        flingBackward 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        obj - the selector of the scrollable object
        isVertical - vertical or horizontal
        返回:
        true if scrolled, and false if can't scroll anymore
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

                   boolean isVertical)
                     throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Performs a forward fling with the default number of fling steps (5). If the swipe direction is set to vertical, then the swipes will be performed from bottom to top. If the swipe direction is set to horizontal, then the swipes will be performed from right to left. Make sure to take into account devices configured with right-to-left languages like Arabic and Hebrew.

        flingForward 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        obj - the selector of the scrollable selector
        isVertical - vertical or horizontal
        返回:
        true if scrolled, and false if can't scroll anymore
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • flingToBeginning

        public boolean flingToBeginning(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector obj,
                       boolean isVertical,
                       int maxSwipes)
                         throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

        maxSwipes - max swipes to achieve beginning.
        返回:
        true on scrolled, else false
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • gesture

        public boolean gesture(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector obj,
              android.graphics.Point startPoint1,
              android.graphics.Point startPoint2,
              android.graphics.Point endPoint1,
              android.graphics.Point endPoint2,
              int steps)
        Generates a two-pointer gesture with arbitrary starting and ending points.
        指定者:
        gesture 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        obj - the target ui object. ??
        startPoint1 - start point of pointer 1
        startPoint2 - start point of pointer 2
        endPoint1 - end point of pointer 1
        endPoint2 - end point of pointer 2
        steps - the number of steps for the gesture. Steps are injected about 5 milliseconds apart, so 100 steps may take around 0.5 seconds to complete.
        返回:
        true if all touch events for this gesture are injected successfully, false otherwise
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • clearTextField

        public void clearTextField(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector uiSelector)
                    throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Clears the existing text contents in an editable field. The UiSelector of this object must reference a UI element that is editable. When you call this method, the method first sets focus at the start edge of the field. The method then simulates a long-press to select the existing text, and deletes the selected text. If a "Select-All" option is displayed, the method will automatically attempt to use it to ensure full text selection. Note that it is possible that not all the text in the field is selected; for example, if the text contains separators such as spaces, slashes, at symbol etc. Also, not all editable fields support the long-press functionality.
        指定者:
        clearTextField 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        uiSelector - the selector of the UiObject.
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • hasWatcherTriggered

        public boolean hasWatcherTriggered(java.lang.String watcherName)
        Checks if a specific registered UiWatcher has triggered. See registerWatcher(String, UiWatcher). If a UiWatcher runs and its checkForCondition() call returned true, then the UiWatcher is considered triggered. This is helpful if a watcher is detecting errors from ANR or crash dialogs and the test needs to know if a UiWatcher has been triggered.
        指定者:
        hasWatcherTriggered 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        watcherName - the name of registered watcher.
        返回:
        true if triggered else false

                               long timeout)
                                 throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Performs a click at the center of the visible bounds of the UI element represented by this UiObject and waits for window transitions. This method differ from click() only in that this method waits for a a new window transition as a result of the click. Some examples of a window transition: - launching a new activity - bringing up a pop-up menu - bringing up a dialog
        指定者:
        clickAndWaitForNewWindow 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine

        返回:

                throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • childByText

        public com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObject childByText(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector collection,
                                                com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector child,
                                                java.lang.String text)
                                                  throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Searches for child UI element within the constraints of this UiSelector selector. It looks for any child matching the childPattern argument that has a child UI element anywhere within its sub hierarchy that has a text attribute equal to text. The returned UiObject will point at the childPattern instance that matched the search and not at the identifying child element that matched the text attribute.
        指定者:
        childByText 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        collection - Selector of UiCollection or UiScrollable.
        text - String of the identifying child contents of of the childPattern
        child - UiSelector selector of the child pattern to match and return
        返回:
        A string ID represent the returned UiObject.
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • childByInstance

        public com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObject childByInstance(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector collection,
                                                    com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector child,
                                                    int instance)
                                                      throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Searches for child UI element within the constraints of this UiSelector.         collection - Selector of UiCollection or UiScrollable
        child - UiSelector selector of the child pattern to match and return
        instance - int the desired matched instance of this childPattern
        返回:
        A string ID represent the returned UiObject.
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • getUiObject

        public com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObject getUiObject(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector selector)
                                                  throws com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException
        Get a new UiObject from the selector.
        指定者:
        getUiObject 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        selector - Selector of the UiObject
        返回:
        A string ID represent the returned UiObject.
        抛出:
        com.android.uiautomator.core.UiObjectNotFoundException

      • exists

        public boolean exists(com.android.uiautomator.core.UiSelector obj)
        Check UiSelector obj exists on screen in 0 second
        指定者:
        exists 在接口中 com.uiautomation.framework.engine.ITestEngine
        参数:
        obj - the UiSelector to check
        返回:
        true is existing
